title: aparadamula nOrva
sahitya:
aparAdhamula nOrva samayamu krpajUDumu ghanamaina nA
(aparAdhamula)

anupallavi

capala cittuDai mana serugakanE jAli beTTu koni moralaniDu
nA  
(aparAdhamula)

caraNam

sakala lOkula phalamula nerigi samrakSincucu nuNDaga
nannokani brOva teliya kIrtana shataka mOnarcu tyAgarAjanuta nA
(aparAdhamula)
